ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Truly it is to your Lord that you will return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Surely your returning is to your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely to your Lord is your return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: However, (all things) will return to your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed towards your Lord only is the return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Surely, unto your Lord is the return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely to your Lord is the return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely unto thy Lord is the Returning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! unto thy Lord is the return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: truly, all will return to your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily Unto thy Lord is the return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed to your Lord is the return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Verily, to thy Lord is the return (of all).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Surely! Unto your Lord is the return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed, to your Lord is the returning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But to your Lord is the return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, to your Lord is the return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [96:8] Surely to your Lord, O man, is the return — [meant as] a threat for him — and so He will requite the rebellious one with what he deserves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! unto thy Lord) Muhammad (is the return) of all created beings in the Hereafter.
